lead_paragraph: The Nets lost their fifth straight game after announcing that Brook Lopez and Thaddeus Young would sit out the rest of the season.

headline.print_headline: Nets Fall to New Orleans as New Pelican Shines
headline.main: Nets Fall to New Orleans as New Pelican Shines

snippet: The Nets lost their fifth straight game after announcing that Brook Lopez and Thaddeus Young would sit out the rest of the season.
